item.title: Data Science Resources
item.description: R Programming üêà R is a programming language and software environment for statistical computing and graphics supported by the R Foundation for Statistical Computing. The R language is widely used among statisticians and data miners for developing statistical software and data analysis. [ Source ] Free resources for learning R R for Data Science - Hadley Wickham Advanced R - Hadley Wickham swirl: Learn R, in R Data Analysis and Visualization Using R MANY R PROGRAMMING TUTORIALS A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R, Find Other Chapters Cookbook for R Learning R in 7 simple steps Python üêç Python is a widely used high-level, general-purpose, interpreted, dynamic programming language.
